name: Vinsmoke Ichiji
text: On Opponent's Attack Once Per Turn If you only have Characters that have a type that includes "GERMA" in play, you may activate this effect. Up to one of you Leaders or Characters gains +1000 power during this battle. Then, trash 2 cards from the top of your deck.
